divs: Sighting Details I was driving down highway 540 and had just passed Springdale going south when I noticed two lights about 3 miles south. At first I thought it was an airplane butbit wasn't moving. Then I thought it was a really tall cell tower but as I approached I didn't see the tower only the lights about 500 feet in the air. As I passed under them it looked a bit like the bottom of a plane except the only lights were on the outer tips and were white and the fact that it wasn't moving. Once I passed it I looked back a few times and I didn't move. Then I was out of sight.
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Fayetteville
There were 3 other sightings in Fayetteville on or around October 9th 2008
Summary: was driving dow highway and see to white lights like the bottom of airplane bit did not move stayed about 500 feet above ground
